aluminium.name: aluminium
aluminium.description: A silvery white and ductile member of the boron group of chemical elements.

carbon.name: carbon
carbon.description: A chemical element critical to organic chemistry.

ethanol.name: ethanol
ethanol.description: A well-known alcohol with a variety of applications.

hydrogen.name: hydrogen
hydrogen.description: A colorless, odorless, nonmetallic, tasteless, highly combustible diatomic gas.

iron.name: iron
iron.description: Pure iron is a metal, and can help with the regeneration of red blood cells after major trauma.

plasma.name: plasma
plasma.description: The liquid phase of an unusual extraterrestrial compound.

potassium.name: potassium
potassium.description: A soft, low-melting solid that can easily be cut with a knife. Reacts violently with water.

silicon.name: silicon
silicon.description: A tetravalent metalloid, silicon is less reactive than its chemical analog carbon.

silver.name: silver
silver.description: A lustrous metallic element regarded as one of the precious metals.

sugar.name: sugar
sugar.description: This white, odorless, crystalline powder has a pleasing, sweet taste.

sugar/sweet_tea.name: sweet tea
sugar/sweet_tea.description: A solution of sugar and tea, popular in the American South.  Some people raise the sugar levels in it to the point of saturation and beyond.

radium.name: radium
radium.description: Radium is an alkaline earth metal. It is highly radioactive.

sodium.name: sodium
sodium.description: A soft, silvery-white, highly reactive alkali metal.

uranium.name: uranium
uranium.description: A radioactive heavy metal commonly used for nuclear fission reactions.

water/water_holy.name: holy water
water/water_holy.description: Blessed water, supposedly effective against evil.

water/tonic.name: tonic water
water/tonic.description: Carbonated water with quinine for a bitter flavor. Protects against Space Malaria.

water/sea.name: seawater
water/sea.description: A little strange. Not like any seawater youve seen. But definitely OSHA approved.

ice.name: ice
ice.description: Its frozen water. What did you expect?!

phenol.name: phenol
phenol.description: Also known as carbolic acid, this is a useful building block in organic chemistry.

drug/bathsalts.name: bath salts
drug/bathsalts.description: Sometimes packaged as a refreshing bathwater additive, these crystals are definitely not for human consumption.

drug/jenkem.name: jenkem
drug/jenkem.description: Jenkem is a prison drug made from fermenting feces in a solution of urine. Extremely disgusting.

drug/crank.name: crank
drug/crank.description: A cheap and dirty stimulant drug, commonly used by space biker gangs.

drug/LSD.name: lysergic acid diethylamide
drug/LSD.description: A highly potent hallucinogenic substance. Far out, maaaan.

drug/lsd_bee.name: lsbee
drug/lsd_bee.description: A highly potent hallucinogenic substance. It smells like honey.

drug/space_drugs.name: space drugs
drug/space_drugs.description: An illegal chemical compound used as a cheap drug.

drug/THC.name: tetrahydrocannabinol
drug/THC.description: A mild psychoactive chemical extracted from the cannabis plant.

drug/CBD.name: cannabidiol
drug/CBD.description: A non-psychoactive phytocannabinoid extracted from the cannabis plant.

drug/nicotine.name: nicotine
drug/nicotine.description: A highly addictive stimulant extracted from the tobacco plant.

drug/nicotine/nicotine2.name: nicotwaine
drug/nicotine/nicotine2.description: A highly addictive stimulant derived from the twobacco plant.

drug/psilocybin.name: psilocybin
drug/psilocybin.description: A powerful hallucinogenic chemical produced by certain mushrooms.

drug/krokodil.name: krokodil
drug/krokodil.description: A sketchy homemade opiate, often used by disgruntled Cosmonauts.

drug/methamphetamine.name: methamphetamine
drug/methamphetamine.description: Methamphetamine is a highly effective and dangerous stimulant drug.

combustible/phlogiston.name: phlogiston
combustible/phlogiston.description: It appears to be liquid fire.

combustible/phlogiston/firedust.name: phlogiston dust
combustible/phlogiston/firedust.description: And this is solid fire. However that works.

combustible/kerosene.name: kerosene
combustible/kerosene.description: A substance widely applied as fuel for aviation vehicles and solvent for metal alloys (when heated).

combustible/thermite.name: thermite
combustible/thermite.description: Thermite burns at an incredibly high temperature. Can be used to melt walls.

combustible/propellant.name: aerosol propellant
combustible/propellant.description: Produces a aerosol spray when heated.

combustible/sonicpowder.name: hootingium
combustible/sonicpowder.description: Produces a loud bang when heated.

combustible/flashpowder.name: flash powder
combustible/flashpowder.description: Produces a bright flash of light when heated.

combustible/infernite.name: chlorine triflouride
combustible/infernite.description: An extremely volatile substance, handle with the utmost care.

combustible/foof.name: FOOF
combustible/foof.description: Dioxygen Diflouride, a ludicrously powerful oxidizer. Run away.

combustible/pyrosium.name: pyrosium
combustible/pyrosium.description: This strange compound seems to slowly heat up all by itself. Very sticky.

combustible/argine.name: argine
combustible/argine.description: This strange material seems to ignite & explode on low temperatures.

combustible/sorium.name: sorium
combustible/sorium.description: Flammable material that causes a powerful shockwave on detonation.

combustible/liquiddarkmatter.name: liquid dark matter
combustible/liquiddarkmatter.description: What has science done ... Its concentrated dark matter in liquid form. And i thought you needed plutonic quarks for that.

combustible/something.name: something
combustible/something.description: What is this thing?  None of the normal tests have been able to determine what exactly this is, just that it is benign.

combustible/fuel.name: welding fuel
combustible/fuel.description: A highly flammable blend of basic hydrocarbons, mostly Acetylene. Useful for both welding and organic chemistry, and can be fortified into a heavier oil.

combustible/nitrogentriiodide/dry.description: A chemical that is stable when in liquid form, but becomes extremely volatile when dry. This is dry. Uh oh.

fooddrink/bilk.name: bilk
fooddrink/bilk.description: This appears to be beer mixed with milk.

fooddrink/milk.name: milk
fooddrink/milk.description: An opaque white liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals.

fooddrink/milk/chocolate_milk.name: chocolate milk
fooddrink/milk/chocolate_milk.description: Chocolate-flavored milk; tastes like being a kid again.

fooddrink/milk/strawberry_milk.name: strawberry milk
fooddrink/milk/strawberry_milk.description: Strawberry-flavored milk; tastes like being a kid again.

fooddrink/milk/blue_milk.name: blue milk
fooddrink/milk/blue_milk.description: Smells like blueberries and tastes worse.

fooddrink/milk/milk_punch.name: milk punch
fooddrink/milk/milk_punch.description: Ugh! Its like a smoothie made of snow cone syrup!

fooddrink/cocktail_fruit_punch.name: fruit punch
fooddrink/cocktail_fruit_punch.description: A mix of fruit juices and sugar; tastes like being a kid again.

fooddrink/alcoholic.name: alcoholic reagent parent
fooddrink/alcoholic.description: You shouldnt be seeing this ingame. If you do, report it to a coder.

fooddrink/alcoholic/hard_punch.name: hard punch
fooddrink/alcoholic/hard_punch.description: A mix of fruit juices and alcohol; tastes like being a kid again, but with wine.

fooddrink/alcoholic/beer.name: beer
fooddrink/alcoholic/beer.description: An alcoholic beverage made from malted grains, hops, yeast, and water.

fooddrink/alcoholic/cider.name: cider
fooddrink/alcoholic/cider.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from apples.

fooddrink/alcoholic/mead.name: mead
fooddrink/alcoholic/mead.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from honey.

fooddrink/alcoholic/wine.name: wine
fooddrink/alcoholic/wine.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from grapes.

fooddrink/alcoholic/champagne.name: champagne
fooddrink/alcoholic/champagne.description: A fizzy alcoholic beverage derived from grapes, made in Champagne, France.

fooddrink/alcoholic/rum.name: rum
fooddrink/alcoholic/rum.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from sugar.

fooddrink/alcoholic/vodka.name: vodka
fooddrink/alcoholic/vodka.description: A strong alcoholic beverage derived from potatoes.

fooddrink/alcoholic/bourbon.name: bourbon
fooddrink/alcoholic/bourbon.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from maize.

fooddrink/alcoholic/tequila.name: tequila
fooddrink/alcoholic/tequila.description: A somewhat notorious liquor made from agave. One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.

fooddrink/alcoholic/ricewine.name: rice wine
fooddrink/alcoholic/ricewine.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from fermented rice.

fooddrink/alcoholic/boorbon.name: BOOrbon
fooddrink/alcoholic/boorbon.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from maize. Also ghosts.

fooddrink/alcoholic/beepskybeer.name: BeepskybrÃ¤u Security Schwarzbier
fooddrink/alcoholic/beepskybeer.description: A dark German beer, typically served with dark bread, cream cheese, and an intense appreciation for the law.

fooddrink/alcoholic/moonshine.name: moonshine
fooddrink/alcoholic/moonshine.description: An illegaly brewed and highly potent alcoholic beverage.

fooddrink/alcoholic/bojack.name: Bo Jack Daniels
fooddrink/alcoholic/bojack.description: A strong beverage. Drinking this will put hair on your chest. Maybe.

fooddrink/alcoholic/cocktail_screwdriver.name: Screwdriver
fooddrink/alcoholic/cocktail_screwdriver.description: A tangy mixture of vodka and orange juice.

fooddrink/alcoholic/cocktail_bloodyscary.name: Bloody Scary
fooddrink/alcoholic/cocktail_bloodyscary.description: A mix of vodka and the blood of a terrible Other Thing.

fooddrink/alcoholic/snakebite.name: Snakebite
fooddrink/alcoholic/snakebite.description: A slightly tart cocktail made from beer and cider that reminds you of autumn.

fooddrink/alcoholic/caipirinha.name: Pineapple Caipirinha
fooddrink/alcoholic/caipirinha.description: A sweet vodka and pineapple cocktail thats fit for a day at the beach.

fooddrink/alcoholic/piscosour.name: Pisco Sour
fooddrink/alcoholic/piscosour.description: A Peruvian drink that mixes brandy, lime juice, egg white, and syrup together.

fooddrink/alcoholic/cocktail_suicider.name: Suicider
fooddrink/alcoholic/cocktail_suicider.description: An unbelievably strong and potent variety of Cider.

fooddrink/alcoholic/cocktail_grog.name: grog
fooddrink/alcoholic/cocktail_grog.description: A highly caustic and nigh-undrinkable substance often associated with piracy.

fooddrink/alcoholic/port.name: port
fooddrink/alcoholic/port.description: A fortified wine frequently implicated in spontaneous teleportation.

fooddrink/alcoholic/gin.name: gin
fooddrink/alcoholic/gin.description: A strong alcoholic beverage that tastes heavily of juniper.

fooddrink/alcoholic/vermouth.name: vermouth
fooddrink/alcoholic/vermouth.description: A fortified wine with botanicals for flavor.

fooddrink/alcoholic/bitters.name: bitters
fooddrink/alcoholic/bitters.description: Extremely bitter extract used to flavor cocktails. Not recommended for consumption on its own.

fooddrink/alcoholic/whiskey_sour.name: Whiskey Sour
fooddrink/alcoholic/whiskey_sour.description: For the manly man who cant quite stomach straight liquor.

fooddrink/alcoholic/daiquiri.name: Daiquiri
fooddrink/alcoholic/daiquiri.description: Rum with some lime juice and sugar.

fooddrink/alcoholic/appletini.name: Appletini
fooddrink/alcoholic/appletini.description: If youve ever wanted the joys of sugary juice boxes mixed with an alcohol burn, this is the drink for you.

fooddrink/alcoholic/Manhattan.name: Manhattan
fooddrink/alcoholic/Manhattan.description: For the alcoholic who doesnt quite want to drink straight from the bottle yet.

fooddrink/alcoholic/libre.name: Space-Cuba Libre
fooddrink/alcoholic/libre.description: Made to celebrate the liberation of Space Cuba in 2028.

fooddrink/alcoholic/ginfizz.name: Gin Fizz
fooddrink/alcoholic/ginfizz.description: Dont question how its fizzing without seltzer.

fooddrink/alcoholic/gimlet.name: Gimlet
fooddrink/alcoholic/gimlet.description: So named because youre a tool if you drink it.

fooddrink/alcoholic/v_gimlet.name: Vodka Gimlet
fooddrink/alcoholic/v_gimlet.description: Trading pine cones for rubbing alcohol.

fooddrink/alcoholic/b_russian.name: Black Russian
fooddrink/alcoholic/b_russian.description: A vodka-infused coffee cocktail. Supposedly created in honor of a US Ambassador that no one remembers.

fooddrink/alcoholic/cosmo.name: Cosmopolitan
fooddrink/alcoholic/cosmo.description: Well, at least its not giving awful dating advice.

fooddrink/alcoholic/beach.name: Bliss on the Beach
fooddrink/alcoholic/beach.description: Fun fact: the previous name of this cocktail was deemed a war crime in 2025.

fooddrink/alcoholic/gtonic.name: Gin and Tonic
fooddrink/alcoholic/gtonic.description: Once made to make bitter medication taste better, now drunk for its flavor.

fooddrink/alcoholic/vtonic.name: Vodka Tonic
fooddrink/alcoholic/vtonic.description: All the bitterness of a gin and tonic, now without any other flavor but alcohol burn!

fooddrink/alcoholic/sonic.name: Gin and Sonic
fooddrink/alcoholic/sonic.description: GOTTA GET CRUNK FAST BUT LIQUOR TOO SLOW

fooddrink/alcoholic/gpink.name: Pink Gin and Tonic
fooddrink/alcoholic/gpink.description: A gin and tonic for people who think the gin gets in the way.

fooddrink/alcoholic/eraser.name: Mind Eraser
fooddrink/alcoholic/eraser.description: Holy shit, youre getting a buzz just looking at this!

fooddrink/alcoholic/dbreath.name: Dragons Breath
fooddrink/alcoholic/dbreath.description: Possessing this stuff probably breaks the Geneva convention.

fooddrink/alcoholic/squeeze.name: squeeze
fooddrink/alcoholic/squeeze.description: Alcohol made from fuel. Do you really think you should drink this? I think you have a problem. Maybe you should talk to a doctor.

fooddrink/alcoholic/hunchback.name: Hunchback
fooddrink/alcoholic/hunchback.description: An alleged cocktail invented by a notorious scientist. Useful in a pinch as an impromptu purgative, or interrogation tool.

fooddrink/alcoholic/madmen.name: Old Fashioned
fooddrink/alcoholic/madmen.description: The favorite drink of unfaithful, alcoholic executives in really nice suits.

fooddrink/alcoholic/planter.name: Planters Punch
fooddrink/alcoholic/planter.description: A Drink then youll have thats not bad - / At least, so they say in Jamaica!

fooddrink/alcoholic/maitai.name: Mai Tai
fooddrink/alcoholic/maitai.description: Even in space, you cant escape Tiki drinks.

fooddrink/alcoholic/lemondrop.name: Lemon Drop
fooddrink/alcoholic/lemondrop.description: Dont forget to cover the rim in sugar!

fooddrink/alcoholic/harlow.name: Jean Harlow
fooddrink/alcoholic/harlow.description: A.K.A. that one actress who would have played Fay Wrays part in King Kong if she hadnt died.

fooddrink/alcoholic/margarita.name: Margarita
fooddrink/alcoholic/margarita.description: Something something Jimmy Buffet something something dated references.

fooddrink/alcoholic/tequini.name: Tequini
fooddrink/alcoholic/tequini.description: You kinda want to punch whoever came up with this name.

fooddrink/alcoholic/pfire.name: Prairie Fire
fooddrink/alcoholic/pfire.description: The leading cause of flaming toilets across the galaxy.

fooddrink/alcoholic/longisland.name: Long Island Iced Tea
fooddrink/alcoholic/longisland.description: Preferred by housewives, raging alcoholics, and the rather large overlap between them.
fooddrink/alcoholic/longisland.taste: like an afternoon on the porch

fooddrink/alcoholic/longbeach.name: Long Beach Iced Tea
fooddrink/alcoholic/longbeach.description: For when you want a healthier glass of knocks-you-the-fuck-out.
fooddrink/alcoholic/longbeach.taste: like an afternoon on the porch

fooddrink/alcoholic/pinacolada.name: PiÃ±a Colada
fooddrink/alcoholic/pinacolada.description: I dont really like being caught in the rain all that much, to be honest.

fooddrink/alcoholic/mimosa.name: Mimosa
fooddrink/alcoholic/mimosa.description: Not a flower, but a sweet cocktail typically served at formal functions.

fooddrink/alcoholic/peachschnapps.name: Peach Schnapps
fooddrink/alcoholic/peachschnapps.description: Everything about this is just peachy.

fooddrink/alcoholic/peachbellini.name: Peach Bellini
fooddrink/alcoholic/peachbellini.description: Named after an Italian artist, peach purÃ©e and white wine mixed together.

fooddrink/alcoholic/rossini.name: Rossini
fooddrink/alcoholic/rossini.description: Named after an Italian composer and like a Bellini, but with strawberry purÃ©e instead of peach.

fooddrink/alcoholic/blackbramble.name: Blackberry Bramble
fooddrink/alcoholic/blackbramble.description: This tart cocktail softens gin with blackberries and lemon juice.

fooddrink/alcoholic/frenchmartini.name: French Martini
fooddrink/alcoholic/frenchmartini.description: Vodka, raspberry liqueur, and pineapple juice. Not actually French.

fooddrink/alcoholic/jazzlemon.name: Jazzberry Hard Lemonade
fooddrink/alcoholic/jazzlemon.description: This unnaturally blue lemonade looks too radical not to drink.

fooddrink/alcoholic/moscowmule.name: Moscow Mule
fooddrink/alcoholic/moscowmule.description: A ginger ale and vodka concoction with a dash of lime.

fooddrink/alcoholic/mintjulep.name: Mint Julep
fooddrink/alcoholic/mintjulep.description: A refreshing cocktail with a minty aftertaste.

fooddrink/alcoholic/mojito.name: Mojito
fooddrink/alcoholic/mojito.description: Rum with some lime juice, sugar, and mint.

fooddrink/alcoholic/bluelagoon.name: Blue Lagoon
fooddrink/alcoholic/bluelagoon.description: A visually and flavorfully pleasing cocktail.

fooddrink/alcoholic/necroni.name: Necroni
fooddrink/alcoholic/necroni.description: A hellish cocktail that stinks of rotting garbage.

fooddrink/alcoholic/wellerman.name: Wellerman
fooddrink/alcoholic/wellerman.description: A great shanty and a nice themed drink as well!

fooddrink/alcoholic/kalimoxto.name: Kalimoxto
fooddrink/alcoholic/kalimoxto.description: A refreshing Spanish mixture of cola and wine.

fooddrink/alcoholic/derby.name: Derby
fooddrink/alcoholic/derby.description: One of the many cocktails with the same name.

fooddrink/alcoholic/horsesneck.name: Horses Neck
fooddrink/alcoholic/horsesneck.description: Not to be confused with a horse mask.

fooddrink/alcoholic/gunfire.name: Gunfire
fooddrink/alcoholic/gunfire.description: A mixture of tea and rum. Huh.

fooddrink/alcoholic/seabreeze.name: Sea Breeze
fooddrink/alcoholic/seabreeze.description: A refreshing mixed drink evocative of the seaside.

fooddrink/alcoholic/hotbutteredrum.name: Hot Buttered Rum
fooddrink/alcoholic/hotbutteredrum.description: A rich and indulgent drink with actual butter in it.
fooddrink/alcoholic/hotbutteredrum.taste: like a nap by the fireplace

fooddrink/alcoholic/fluffycritter.name: Fluffy Critter
fooddrink/alcoholic/fluffycritter.description: A sweet mixed drink with a cutesy name.

fooddrink/alcoholic/michelada.name: Michelada
fooddrink/alcoholic/michelada.description: Â¡Una cerveza preparada de perfecta para los sedientos habitantes de la estaciÃ³n espacial que quieren algo con un bocado!

fooddrink/alcoholic/espressomartini.name: Espresso Martini
fooddrink/alcoholic/espressomartini.description: Does this really count as a Martini?

fooddrink/alcoholic/threemileislandicedt.name: Three Mile Island Iced Tea
fooddrink/alcoholic/threemileislandicedt.description: Contains no tea, and also no radioactive particles.

fooddrink/ectocooler.name: Ecto Cooler
fooddrink/ectocooler.description: Said to taste exactly like a proton beam. Considering anyone whos tried to taste a proton beam has lost their jaws, its hard to say where this idea came from.

fooddrink/refried_beans.name: refried beans
fooddrink/refried_beans.description: A dish made of mashed beans cooked with lard.

fooddrink/death_spice.name: death spice
fooddrink/death_spice.description: Despite its name, this sweet-smelling black powder is completely harmless. Maybe.

fooddrink/capsaicin.name: capsaicin
fooddrink/capsaicin.description: A potent irritant produced by pepper plants in the Capsicum genus.

fooddrink/el_diablo.name: El Diablo chili
fooddrink/el_diablo.description: Rumored to be the tears of the devil himself.

fooddrink/sarsaparilla.name: sarsaparilla
fooddrink/sarsaparilla.description: A refreshing beverage that only, like, four people on-station like.

fooddrink/cheese.name: cheese
fooddrink/cheese.description: Some cheese. Pour it out to make it solid.

fooddrink/gcheese.name: weird cheese
fooddrink/gcheese.description: Hell, I dont even know if this IS cheese. Whatever it is, it aint normal. If you want to, pour it out to make it solid.

fooddrink/meat_slurry.name: meat slurry
fooddrink/meat_slurry.description: A paste comprised of highly-processed organic material. Uncomfortably similar to deviled ham spread.

fooddrink/coffee.name: coffee
fooddrink/coffee.description: Coffee is a brewed drink prepared from roasted seeds, commonly called coffee beans, of the coffee plant.

fooddrink/coffee/espresso.name: espresso
fooddrink/coffee/espresso.description: An espresso is a strong black coffee with more caffeine.

fooddrink/coffee/espresso/expresso.name: expresso
fooddrink/coffee/espresso/expresso.description: An expresso is a strong black coffee with more stupid.

fooddrink/coffee/espresso/decaf.name: decaf espresso
fooddrink/coffee/espresso/decaf.description: A decaf espresso contains less caffeine than a regular espresso.

fooddrink/coffee/energydrink.name: energy drink
fooddrink/coffee/energydrink.description: An energy drink is a liquid plastic with a high amount of caffeine.

fooddrink/tea.name: tea
fooddrink/tea.description: An aromatic beverage derived from the leaves of the camellia sinensis plant.

fooddrink/honey_tea.name: honey tea
fooddrink/honey_tea.description: An aromatic beverage derived from the leaves of the camellia sinensis plant. Theres a little bit of honey in it.

fooddrink/mint_tea.name: mint tea
fooddrink/mint_tea.description: An aromatic beverage derived from the leaves of the camellia sinensis plant. Theres a little bit of mint in it.

fooddrink/ginger_ale.name: ginger ale
fooddrink/ginger_ale.description: A delightful carbonated beverage with ginger flavor.

fooddrink/chocolate.name: chocolate
fooddrink/chocolate.description: Chocolate is a delightful product derived from the seeds of the theobroma cacao tree.

fooddrink/nectar.name: nectar
fooddrink/nectar.description: A sweet liquid produced by plants to attract pollinators.

fooddrink/honey.name: honey
fooddrink/honey.description: A sweet substance produced by bees through partial digestion. Bee barf.

fooddrink/royal_jelly.name: royal jelly
fooddrink/royal_jelly.description: A nutritive gel used to induce extended development in the larvae of greater domestic space-bees.

fooddrink/eggnog.name: egg nog
fooddrink/eggnog.description: A festive dairy drink made with beaten eggs.

fooddrink/guacamole.name: guacamole
fooddrink/guacamole.description: A paste comprised primarily of avocado.

fooddrink/catonium.name: catonium
fooddrink/catonium.description: An herbal extract noted for its peculiar effect on felines.

fooddrink/vanilla.name: vanilla
fooddrink/vanilla.description: An expensive spice of the new world. Combination with ice not recommended.

fooddrink/chickensoup.name: chicken soup
fooddrink/chickensoup.description: An old household remedy for mild illnesses.

fooddrink/ketchup.name: ketchup
fooddrink/ketchup.description: A condiment often used on hotdogs and sandwiches.

fooddrink/mustard.name: mustard
fooddrink/mustard.description: A condiment often used on hotdogs and sandwiches.

fooddrink/soysauce.name: soy sauce
fooddrink/soysauce.description: A dark brown sauce brewed from soybeans and wheat. Salty!

fooddrink/porktonium.name: porktonium
fooddrink/porktonium.description: A highly-radioactive pork byproduct first discovered in hotdogs.

fooddrink/mugwort.name: mugwort
fooddrink/mugwort.description: A rather bitter herb once thought to hold magical protective properties.

fooddrink/grease.name: space-soybean oil
fooddrink/grease.description: An oil derived from extra-terrestrial soybeans.

fooddrink/badgrease.name: partially hydrogenated space-soybean oil
fooddrink/badgrease.description: An oil derived from extra-terrestrial soybeans, with additional hydrogen atoms added to convert it into a saturated form.

fooddrink/cornstarch.name: corn starch
fooddrink/cornstarch.description: The powdered starch of maize, derived from the kernels endosperm. Used as a thickener for gravies and puddings.

fooddrink/cornsyrup.name: corn syrup
fooddrink/cornsyrup.description: A sweet syrup derived from corn starch that has had its starches converted into maltose and other sugars.

fooddrink/VHFCS.name: very-high-fructose corn syrup
fooddrink/VHFCS.description: An incredibly sweet syrup, created from corn syrup treated with enzymes to convert its sugars into fructose.

fooddrink/gravy.name: gravy
fooddrink/gravy.description: A savory sauce made from a simple meat-dripping roux and milk.

fooddrink/mashedpotatoes.name: mashed potatoes
fooddrink/mashedpotatoes.description: A starchy food paste made from boiled potatoes.

fooddrink/msg.name: monosodium glutamate
fooddrink/msg.description: Monosodium Glutamate is a sodium salt known chiefly for its use as a controversial flavor enhancer.

fooddrink/egg.name: egg
fooddrink/egg.description: A runny and viscous mixture of clear and yellow fluids.

fooddrink/beff.name: beff
fooddrink/beff.description: An advanced blend of mechanically-recovered meat and textured synthesized protein product notable for its unusual crystalline grain when sliced.

fooddrink/enriched_msg.name: Enriched MSG
fooddrink/enriched_msg.description: This highly illegal substance was only rumored to exist; it is the most flavorful substance known. It is believed that it causes such euphoria that the body begins to heal its own wounds, however no living creature can resist having seconds.

fooddrink/pepperoni.name: pepperoni
fooddrink/pepperoni.description: An Italian-American variety of salami usually made from beef and pork.

fooddrink/mint.name: mint
fooddrink/mint.description: A light green liquid extracted from mint leaves.

fooddrink/juice_lime.name: lime juice
fooddrink/juice_lime.description: A citric beverage extracted from limes.

fooddrink/juice_cran.name: Cranberry juice
fooddrink/juice_cran.description: An extremely tart juice usually mixed into other drinks and juices.

fooddrink/juice_orange.name: orange juice
fooddrink/juice_orange.description: A citric beverage extracted from oranges.

fooddrink/juice_lemon.name: lemon juice
fooddrink/juice_lemon.description: A citric beverage extracted from lemons.

fooddrink/juice_tomato.name: tomato juice
fooddrink/juice_tomato.description: Tomatoes pureed down to a liquid state.

fooddrink/juice_blueberry.name: blueberry juice
fooddrink/juice_blueberry.description: Dont get it on your hands or itll be there forever.

fooddrink/juice_blackberry.name: blackberry juice
fooddrink/juice_blackberry.description: Dark, fruity, and definitely going to stain.

fooddrink/juice_raspberry.name: raspberry juice
fooddrink/juice_raspberry.description: Sweet, tart, and reminds you of summertime.

fooddrink/juice_cherry.name: cherry juice
fooddrink/juice_cherry.description: The juice from a thousand screaming cherries. Silent screams.

fooddrink/juice_blueraspberry.name: blue raspberry juice
fooddrink/juice_blueraspberry.description: Radically flavorlicious. Theres really nothing else to call it.

fooddrink/juice_pineapple.name: pineapple juice
fooddrink/juice_pineapple.description: Juice from a pineapple. A surprise, considering the name!

fooddrink/juice_peach.name: peach juice
fooddrink/juice_peach.description: An artificial peach drink that is legally sold as 100% all natural peach juice.

fooddrink/juice_carrot.name: carrot juice
fooddrink/juice_carrot.description: A glass of carrot juice a day keeps the ophthalmologist away.

fooddrink/juice_pumpkin.name: pumpkin juice
fooddrink/juice_pumpkin.description: The journey to juice a pumpkin has finally come to an end, with very orange results.

fooddrink/juice_grapefruit.name: grapefruit juice
fooddrink/juice_grapefruit.description: A tart beverage extracted from grapefruits.

fooddrink/coconut_milk.name: coconut milk
fooddrink/coconut_milk.description: Well, its not actually milk, considering that coconuts arent mammals with mammary glands. Its really more like coconut juice. Or coconut water.

fooddrink/turmeric.name: turmeric powder
fooddrink/turmeric.description: Has a warm, spicy scent and nausea-soothing properties. But if you get this shit on something, the stains NEVER coming out.

fooddrink/juice_pickle.name: pickle juice
fooddrink/juice_pickle.description: A salty brine containing garlic and dill, typically used to ferment and pickle cucumbers.

fooddrink/cocktail_citrus.name: triple citrus
fooddrink/cocktail_citrus.description: A refreshing mixed drink of orange, lemon and lime juice.

fooddrink/cocktail_triple.name: Triple Triple
fooddrink/cocktail_triple.description: What the fuck is this, somehow the liquid looks unable to settle.

fooddrink/lemonade.name: lemonade
fooddrink/lemonade.description: A refreshing, sweet and sour drink consisting of sugar and lemon juice.

fooddrink/lemonade/limeade.name: limeade
fooddrink/lemonade/limeade.description: A refreshing, sweet and sour drink consisting of sugar and lime juice.

fooddrink/halfandhalf.name: half and half
fooddrink/halfandhalf.description: A mixture of half lemonade and half tea, sometimes named after a dead Earth golfer. Not to be confused with the dairy kind.

fooddrink/laurapalmer.name: laura palmer
fooddrink/laurapalmer.description: A mixture of half lemonade and half coffee.

fooddrink/temp_bioeffect/innitium.name: innitium
fooddrink/temp_bioeffect/innitium.description: A real briish substance, innit bruv?

fooddrink/temp_bioeffect/caledonium.name: caledonium
fooddrink/temp_bioeffect/caledonium.description: A brave blue substance with flecks of tartan.

fooddrink/temp_bioeffect/essenceofelvis.name: essence of Elvis
fooddrink/temp_bioeffect/essenceofelvis.description: The King is dead, but a part of him lives on in all of us.

fooddrink/temp_bioeffect/worcestershire_.name: Worcestershire sauce
fooddrink/temp_bioeffect/worcestershire_.description: Just looking at this substance makes you want to break for Tea.

fooddrink/boneyjuice.name: the satisfaction of making spaghetti
fooddrink/boneyjuice.description: The congealed essence of cullinary passion.

fooddrink/fakecheese.name: cheese substitute
fooddrink/fakecheese.description: A cheese-like substance derived loosely from actual cheese.

fooddrink/friedessence.name: The Physical Manifestation Of The Very Concept Of Fried Food
fooddrink/friedessence.description: Liquified fryer science. This stuff is liquid gold!

fooddrink/ghostchilijuice.name: ghost chili juice
fooddrink/ghostchilijuice.description: Juice from the universes hottest chilli. Do not consume.
fooddrink/ghostchilijuice.taste: like the surface of the sun

fooddrink/alcoholic/nicotini.name: nicotini
fooddrink/alcoholic/nicotini.description: Why would you even mix this? How does nicotine even taste?

fooddrink/alcoholic/rcola.name: Rum and Cola
fooddrink/alcoholic/rcola.description: Its fizzy, its tangy, and perfect for when you cant decide if you wanna get the jitters or knock yourself out!

fooddrink/alcoholic/honky_tonic.name: Honky Tonic
fooddrink/alcoholic/honky_tonic.description: The true miracle of this bastardization of mixology is that it somehow isnt lethal.

fooddrink/alcoholic/lingtea.name: Ling Island Iced Tea
fooddrink/alcoholic/lingtea.description: Preferred by changelings, crew members, and the surprising overlap between them.

fooddrink/alcoholic/hottoddy.name: hot Toddy
fooddrink/alcoholic/hottoddy.description: A warm, late night drink, usually enjoyed during long winter nights.

fooddrink/grenadine.name: grenadine
fooddrink/grenadine.description: A sticky, sweet and tart non-alcoholic bar syrup, used in cocktails for its distinct bright red colour.

fooddrink/lemonade/pinklemonade.name: pink lemonade
fooddrink/lemonade/pinklemonade.description: A popular twist on cloudy lemonade, this soft drink has been dyed pink. How colourful.

fooddrink/alcoholic/duckfart.name: Duck Fart
fooddrink/alcoholic/duckfart.description: An eccentric trio cocktail, in which the three ingredients have been layered on top one another.

fooddrink/alcoholic/philcollins.name: Phil Collins
fooddrink/alcoholic/philcollins.description: A variation on a well known drink, paying tribute to a well known drummer.

fooddrink/alcoholic/spicedrum.name: spiced rum
fooddrink/alcoholic/spicedrum.description: An egregious and disgusting misinterpretation of some perfectly good rum.

fooddrink/alcoholic/beesknees.name: Bees Knees
fooddrink/alcoholic/beesknees.description: A cocktail from the prohibition era, named after a popular expression.

fooddrink/alcoholic/tealquila.name: Tealquila Sunrise
fooddrink/alcoholic/tealquila.description: A shockingly teal cocktail infused with benign gnesis, effective at neutralizing the more aggresssive variety.

fooddrink/matcha.name: matcha
fooddrink/matcha.description: A finely ground powder made from green tea leaves.

fooddrink/matchatea.name: matcha tea
fooddrink/matchatea.description: A type of green tea thats been served for centuries in China and Japan.
fooddrink/matchatea.taste: sweet with a hint of bitter

fooddrink/iced/coconutmilkespresso.name: iced coconut milk espresso
fooddrink/iced/coconutmilkespresso.description: A creamy iced espresso, mixed with coconut milk.

fooddrink/iced/thaicoffee.name: Thai iced coffee
fooddrink/iced/thaicoffee.description: A local favorite, now available on demand.

fooddrink/pumpkinspicelatte.name: pumpkin spice latte
fooddrink/pumpkinspicelatte.description: Whether or not it contains actual pumpkin juice has been up for debate.

fooddrink/lavenderlatte.name: lavender latte
fooddrink/lavenderlatte.description: The whimsical cousin of the pumpkin spice latte.
fooddrink/lavenderlatte.taste: like living in a cottage in the countryside

medical/lexorin.name: lexorin
medical/lexorin.description: Lexorin temporarily stops respiration. Causes tissue damage.

medical/spaceacillin.name: spaceacillin
medical/spaceacillin.description: An all-purpose antibiotic agent extracted from space fungus.

medical/morphine.name: morphine
medical/morphine.description: A strong but highly addictive opiate painkiller with sedative side effects.

medical/ether.name: ether
medical/ether.description: A strong but highly addictive anesthetic and sedative.

medical/cold_medicine.name: robustissin
medical/cold_medicine.description: A pharmaceutical compound used to treat minor colds, coughs, and other ailments.

medical/teporone.name: teporone
medical/teporone.description: This experimental plasma-based compound seems to regulate body temperature.

medical/salicylic_acid.name: salicylic acid
medical/salicylic_acid.description: This is a is a standard salicylate pain reliever and fever reducer.

medical/menthol.name: menthol
medical/menthol.description: Menthol relieves burns and aches while providing a cooling sensation.

medical/calomel.name: calomel
medical/calomel.description: This potent purgative rids the body of impurities. It is highly toxic however and close supervision is required.

medical/yobihodazine.name: yobihodazine
medical/yobihodazine.description: A powerful outlawed compound capable of preventing vaccuum damage. Prolonged use leads to neurological damage.

medical/synthflesh.name: synthetic flesh
medical/synthflesh.description: A resorbable microfibrillar collagen and protein mixture that can rapidly heal injuries when applied topically.

medical/synaptizine.name: synaptizine
medical/synaptizine.description: Synaptizine a mild medical stimulant. Can be used to reduce drowsyness and resist disabling symptoms such as paralysis.

medical/omnizine.name: omnizine
medical/omnizine.description: Omnizine is a highly potent healing medication that can be used to treat a wide range of injuries.

medical/saline.name: saline-glucose solution
medical/saline.description: This saline and glucose solution can help stabilize critically injured patients and cleanse wounds.

medical/anti_rad.name: potassium iodide
medical/anti_rad.description: Potassium Iodide is a medicinal drug used to counter the effects of radiation poisoning.

medical/oculine.name: oculine
medical/oculine.description: Oculine is a combined eye and ear medication with antibiotic effects.

medical/haloperidol.name: haloperidol
medical/haloperidol.description: Haloperidol is a powerful antipsychotic and sedative. Will help control psychiatric problems, but may cause brain damage.

medical/epinephrine.name: epinephrine
medical/epinephrine.description: Epinephrine is a potent neurotransmitter, used in medical emergencies to halt anaphylactic shock and prevent cardiac arrest.

medical/heparin.name: heparin
medical/heparin.description: An anticoagulant used in heart surgeries, and in the treatment of heart attacks and blood clots.

medical/proconvertin.name: proconvertin
medical/proconvertin.description: A protein that causes blood to begin clotting, which can be useful in cases of uncontrollable bleeding, but it may also cause dangerous blood clots to form.

medical/filgrastim.name: filgrastim
medical/filgrastim.description: A granulocyte colony stimulating factor analog, a hematopoiesis stimulant, which helps the body to produce more white blood cells, and thus more blood in general.

medical/insulin.name: insulin
medical/insulin.description: A hormone generated by the pancreas responsible for metabolizing carbohydrates and fat in the bloodstream.

medical/silver_sulfadiazine.name: silver sulfadiazine
medical/silver_sulfadiazine.description: This antibacterial compound is used to treat burn victims.

medical/mutadone.name: mutadone
medical/mutadone.description: Mutadone is an experimental bromide that can cure genetic abnomalities.

medical/penteticacid.name: pentetic acid
medical/penteticacid.description: Pentetic Acid is an aggressive chelation agent. May cause tissue damage. Use with caution.

medical/antihistamine.name: diphenhydramine
medical/antihistamine.description: Anti-allergy medication. May cause drowsiness, do not operate heavy machinery while using this.

medical/styptic_powder.name: styptic powder
medical/styptic_powder.description: Styptic (aluminium sulfate) powder helps control bleeding and heal physical wounds.

medical/cryoxadone.name: cryoxadone
medical/cryoxadone.description: A plasma mixture with almost magical healing powers. Its main limitation is that the targets body temperature must be under 265K for it to metabolise correctly.

medical/atropine.name: atropine
medical/atropine.description: Atropine is a potent cardiac resuscitant but it can causes confusion, dizzyness and hyperthermia.

medical/salbutamol.name: salbutamol
medical/salbutamol.description: Salbutamol is a common bronchodilation medication for asthmatics. It may help with other breathing problems as well.

medical/perfluorodecalin.name: perfluorodecalin
medical/perfluorodecalin.description: This experimental perfluoronated solvent has applications in liquid breathing and tissue oxygenation. Use with caution.

medical/mannitol.name: mannitol
medical/mannitol.description: Mannitol is a sugar alcohol that can help alleviate cranial swelling.

medical/charcoal.name: charcoal
medical/charcoal.description: Activated charcoal helps to absorb toxins.

medical/antihol.name: antihol
medical/antihol.description: A medicine which quickly eliminates alcohol in the body.

medical/ipecac.name: space ipecac
medical/ipecac.description: Used to induce emesis. In space.

medical/necrovirus_cure.name: necrovirus_cure
medical/necrovirus_cure.description: The cure for the necrovirus/Zombie Disease. Can be used to totally cure infected below stage 4.

nitroglycerin.name: nitroglycerin
nitroglycerin.description: A miracle worker in treating cardiac failure. Very, very volatile and sensitive compound. Do not run while handling this. Do not throw this. Do not splash this.

copper_nitrate.name: copper nitrate
copper_nitrate.description: An intermediary which sublimates at 180 Â°C.

silver_nitrate.name: silver nitrate
silver_nitrate.description: A versatile precursor with some minor caustic applications.

silver_fulminate.name: silver fulminate
silver_fulminate.description: A very volatile mixture that can react given the slightest stimulus.

aranesp.name: aranesp
aranesp.description: An illegal performance enhancing drug. Side effects might include chest pain, seizures, swelling, headache, fever... ... ...

anti_fart.name: simethicone
anti_fart.description: This strange liquid seems to have no bubbles on the surface.

honk_fart.name: honkfartium
honk_fart.description: This always-bubbling liquid looks pretty funny.

omegazine.name: omegazine
omegazine.description: A dangerous chemical that allows for seemingly superhuman feats for a short time ...

hairgrownium.name: hairgrownium
hairgrownium.description: A mysterious chemical purported to help grow hair. Often found on late-night TV infomercials.

super_hairgrownium.name: super hairgrownium
super_hairgrownium.description: A mysterious and powerful chemical purported to cause rapid hair growth.

unstable_omega_hairgrownium.name: unstable omega hairgrownium
unstable_omega_hairgrownium.description: An unstable variation of a mysterious extremely powerful chemical purported to help grow unusual hair. This one is bubbling intensely.

stable_omega_hairgrownium.name: stable omega hairgrownium
stable_omega_hairgrownium.description: A mysterious extremely powerful chemical purported to help grow unusual hair.

anima.name: anima
anima.description: Anima ... The animating force of the universe.

strange_reagent.name: strange reagent
strange_reagent.description: A glowing green fluid highly reminiscent of nuclear waste.

carpet.name: carpet
carpet.description: A covering of thick fabric used on floors. This type looks particularly gross.

fffoam.name: firefighting foam
fffoam.description: Carbon Tetrachloride is a foam used for fire suppression.

silicate.name: silicate
silicate.description: A compound that can be used to reinforce glass.

graphene_compound.name: Graphene Hardening Compound
graphene_compound.description: A thick industrial compound used to reinforce things.

fluorosurfactant.name: fluorosurfactant
fluorosurfactant.description: A perfluoronated sulfonic acid that forms a foam when mixed with water.

lube.name: space lube
lube.description: Lubricant is a substance introduced between two moving surfaces to reduce the friction and wear between them.

superlube.name: organic superlubricant
superlube.description: Organic superlube is great stuff, but itll try and slide away from you the first chance it gets.

glue.name: space glue
glue.description: Industrial superglue that is sure to stick to everything.

ammonia.name: ammonia
ammonia.description: A caustic substance commonly used in fertilizer or household cleaners.

diethylamine.name: diethylamine
diethylamine.description: A secondary amine, useful as a plant nutrient and as building block for other compounds.

acetone.name: acetone
acetone.description: Pure 100% nail polish remover, also works as an industrial solvent.

stabiliser.name: stabilising agent
stabiliser.description: A chemical that stabilises normally volatile compounds, preventing them from reacting immediately.

ectoplasm.name: ectoplasm
ectoplasm.description: A bizarre gelatinous substance supposedly derived from ghosts.

space_fungus.name: space fungus
space_fungus.description: Scrapings of some unknown fungus found growing on the station walls.

cryostylane.name: cryostylane
cryostylane.description: An incredibly cold substance.  Used in many high-demand cooling systems.

booster_enzyme.name: booster enzyme
booster_enzyme.description: This booster enzyme helps the body to replicate beneficial chemicals.

space_cleaner.name: space cleaner
space_cleaner.description: A compound used to clean things. It has a sharp, unpleasant odor.

luminol.name: luminol
luminol.description: A chemical that can detect trace amounts of blood.

oil.name: oil
oil.description: A decent lubricant for machines. High in benzene, naptha and other hydrocarbons.

capulettium.name: capulettium
capulettium.description: A rare drug that causes the user to appear dead for some time.

capulettium_plus.name: capulettium plus
capulettium_plus.description: A rare and expensive drug that causes the user to appear dead for some time while they retain consciousness and vision.

life.name: life
life.description: Just a placeholder thing, you shouldnt be seeing this!

ageinium.name: ageinium
ageinium.description: A crusty fluid that smells like old people.

denatured_enzyme.name: denatured enzyme
denatured_enzyme.description: Heated beyond usefulness, this enzyme is now worthless.

enzymatic_leftovers.name: enzymatic leftovers
enzymatic_leftovers.description: Leftover chemical garbage produced as a byproduct of a beneficial enzyme.

werewolf_serum_fake3.name: Werewolf Serum Precursor Gamma
werewolf_serum_fake3.description: A direct precursor to a special, targeted mutagen.

werewolf_serum_fake4.name: Imperfect Werewolf Serum
werewolf_serum_fake4.description: A flawed isomer of a special, targeted mutagen.  If only it were perfected...

ants.name: ants
ants.description: A sample of a lost breed of Space Ants (formicidae bastardium tyrannus), they are well-known for ravaging the living shit out of pretty much anything.

spiders.name: spiders
spiders.description: A bunch of tiny little spiders, all crawling around in a big spidery blob.

hugs.name: pure hugs
hugs.description: Hugs, in liquid form.  Yes, the concept of a hug.  As a liquid.  This makes sense in the future.

love.name: pure love
love.description: What is this emotion you humans call \love?\  Oh, its this?  This is it? Huh, well okay then, thanks.

colors.name: colorful reagent
colors.description: Its pure liquid colors. Thats a thing now.

gypsum.name: calcium sulfate
gypsum.description: An inorganic chemical that has many uses in the industrial sector.

calcium_carbonate.name: calcium carbonate
calcium_carbonate.description: A naturally occuring chemical found in seashells and certain rocks.

chalk.name: chalk
chalk.description: A mixture of minerals and additives that is commonly used as a writing implement.

shark_dna.name: space shark DNA
shark_dna.description: How this was obtained is anyones guess.

packing_peanuts.name: packing peanuts
packing_peanuts.description: Those little white things you get when you order stuff in boxes. Not to be confused with ghost poop.

wax.name: wax
wax.description: A lipid compound used in candles and for making haunted sculptures to terrorize Scooby Doo.

pollen.name: pollenium
pollen.description: A pollen-derivative with a number of proteins and other nutrients vital to space bee health. Not palatable for humans.

flockdrone_fluid.name: coagulated gnesis
flockdrone_fluid.description: A thick teal fluid of alien origin. It moves in ways that suggest it might be alive in some way.

black_goop.name: gross black goop
black_goop.description: Youre not even sure what this is. Its pretty grody.

paper.name: paper
paper.description: Little flecks of paper, all torn up.

rubber.name: rubber
rubber.description: A somewhat durable material that someone managed to squeeze out of a tree.

flubber.name: Liquified space rubber
flubber.description: It seems to be vibrating and bouncing around its container rapidly

fliptonium/glowing_fliptonium.name: glowing fliptonium
fliptonium/glowing_fliptonium.description: Theres something kinda weird about this stuff. Something off. Something... spooky.

diluted_fliptonium.name: diluted fliptonium
diluted_fliptonium.description: Youre a rude dude with a rude tude.

diluted_transparium.name: diluted transparium
diluted_transparium.description: This looks a lot like plain water. Are you sure you didnt mess up?

fartonium.name: fartonium
fartonium.description: Oh god it never ends, IT NEVER STOPS!

diluted_flaptonium.name: diluted flaptonium
diluted_flaptonium.description: Youre not a bird, cut that out.

green_goop.name: strange green goop
green_goop.description: A foul substance that seems to quiver oddly near certain spots.

voltagen.name: voltagen
voltagen.description: Electricity in pure liquid form. However that works.

lumen.name: Lumen
lumen.description: A viscous liquid that seems to glow rather cheerfully. Perhaps applying this to things might brighten up someones day.

weedkiller.name: atrazine
weedkiller.description: A herbicidal compound used for destroying unwanted plants.

safrole.name: safrole
safrole.description: A common food additive with a distinctive candy shop aroma.

ash.name: ash
ash.description: Ashes to ashes, dust to dust.

potash.name: potash
potash.description: A white crystalline compound, useful for boosting crop yields.

plant_nutrients.name: saltpetre
plant_nutrients.description: Potassium nitrate, commonly used for fertilizer, cured meats and fireworks production.

blood.name: blood
blood.description: A substance found in many living creatures.

vomit.name: vomit
vomit.description: Looks like someone lost their lunch. And then collected it. Yuck.

gvomit.name: green vomit
gvomit.description: Whoa, that cant be natural. Thats horrible.

big_bang_precursor.name: stable bose-einstein macro-condensate
big_bang_precursor.description: This is a strange viscous fluid that seems to have the properties of both a liquid and a gas.

cyclopentanol.name: cyclopentanol
cyclopentanol.description: A substance not particularly worth noting.

magnesium_chloride.name: magnesium chloride
magnesium_chloride.description: A white powder thats capable of binding a high amount of ammonia while on room temperature.

mg_nh3_cl.name: magnesium-ammonium chloride
mg_nh3_cl.description: A white powder binding a high amount of ammonia. The ammonia is released when the mixture is heated above 150 degrees celsius.

butter.name: butter
butter.description: Closer inspection reveals that it is indeed butter.

glucose_polymer.name: glucose polymer
glucose_polymer.description: A liquid polymer consisting of glucose, commonly used in extended release applications for pharmaceuticals.

mimicillium.name: Mimicillium
mimicillium.description: Just looking at this, you get the feeling that a vote for Death Badman is a vote for Death Badman.

bubsium.name: Bubsium
bubsium.description: The liquified and concentrated essence of the mysterious character Bubs.

miasma.name: miasma
miasma.description: Gross miasma produced by corpse decay.

sakuride.name: sakuride
sakuride.description: A big pile of sakura petals!

grassgro.name: Grass Gro
grassgro.description: Concentrated liquid Spacegrass. Guaranteed to grow Spacegrass anywhere.

cloak_juice.name: cloaked panellus extract
cloak_juice.description: ERR: SPECTROSCOPIC ANALYSIS OF THIS SUBSTANCE IS NOT POSSIBLE.

fog.name: fog
fog.description: An inert gas that appears very thick in smoke.

iron_oxide.name: Iron Oxide
iron_oxide.description: Iron, artifically rusted under the effects of oxygen, acetic acid, salt and a high temperature enviroment.

calcium_carbonate.name: calcium carbonate
calcium_carbonate.description: A naturally occuring chemical found in seashells and certain rocks.

lime.name: calcium oxide
lime.description: A material made primarily of calcium oxides, with trace amounts of other minerals present. It can cause pretty severe skin irritation.

gypsum.name: calcium sulfate
gypsum.description: An inorganic chemical that has many uses in the industrial sector.

silicon_dioxide.name: silicon dioxide
silicon_dioxide.description: Also known as Silica, it is one of the main minerals found in sand.

sodium_sulfate.name: sodium sulfate
sodium_sulfate.description: A chemical compound that is used in dying textiles and manufacturing glass.

cement/perfect_cement.name: ultrahigh grade supercement
cement/perfect_cement.description: A perfect mixture of different minerals and chemicals that binds with an aggregate to form a rock-solid... solid.

cement/good_cement.name: high grade cement
cement/good_cement.description: A great mixture of different minerals and chemicals that binds with an aggregate to form a rock-solid... solid.

cement/ok_cement.name: cement
cement/ok_cement.description: A mixture of different minerals and chemicals that binds with an aggregate to form a rock-solid... solid.

cement/poor_cement.name: low grade cement
cement/poor_cement.description: A poor mixture of different minerals and chemicals that binds with an aggregate to form a rock-solid... solid.

concrete/perfect_concrete.name: ultra high grade superconcrete
concrete/perfect_concrete.description: A perfectly formulated blend of chemical agents, water, an aggregate and cement.

concrete/good_concrete.name: high grade concrete
concrete/good_concrete.description: A well formulated blend of chemical agents, water, an aggregate and cement.

concrete/okay_concrete.name: concrete
concrete/okay_concrete.description: A blend of chemical agents, water, an aggregate and cement.

concrete/poor_concrete.name: low grade concrete
concrete/poor_concrete.description: A low quality blend of chemical agents, water, an aggregate and cement.

harmful/acid.name: sulfuric acid
harmful/acid.description: A strong mineral acid with the molecular formula H2SO4.

harmful/acid/clacid.name: hydrochloric acid
harmful/acid/clacid.description: A strong acid with the molecular formula HCl.

harmful/acetic_acid.name: acetic acid
harmful/acetic_acid.description: A weak acid that is the main component of vinegar and bad hangovers.

harmful/amanitin.name: amanitin
harmful/amanitin.description: A toxin produced by certain mushrooms. Very deadly.

harmful/chemilin.name: chemilin
harmful/chemilin.description: Discovered by A. S. Wonkington, on a friday the 13th, during lunch break. This cheese compound is unbelievably lethal.

harmful/coniine.name: coniine
harmful/coniine.description: A neurotoxin that rapidly causes respiratory failure.

harmful/cyanide.name: cyanide
harmful/cyanide.description: A highly toxic chemical with some uses as a building block for other things.

harmful/ricin.name: space ricin
harmful/ricin.description: Extremely toxic, but slow acting, stealthy, and hard to cure agent that causes organ failure.

harmful/formaldehyde.name: embalming fluid
harmful/formaldehyde.description: Formaldehyde is a common industrial chemical and is used to preserve corpses and medical samples. It is highly toxic and irritating. Casualdehyde is the less invasive form of this chemical.

harmful/acetaldehyde.name: acetaldehyde
harmful/acetaldehyde.description: Acetaldehyde is a common industrial chemical. It is a severe irritant.

harmful/lipolicide.name: lipolicide
harmful/lipolicide.description: A compound found in many seedy dollar stores in the form of a weight-loss tonic.

harmful/initropidril.name: initropidril
harmful/initropidril.description: A highly potent cardiac poison - can kill within minutes.

harmful/initrobeedril_old.name: old initrobeedril
harmful/initrobeedril_old.description: A highly experimental poison originally created by a mad scientist by the name of \SpyGuy\ on earth in 2014.

harmful/initrobeedril.name: initrobeedril
harmful/initrobeedril.description: A highly experimental poison originally created by a mad scientist by the name of \SpyGuy\ on earth in 2014.

harmful/royal_initrobeedril.name: royal initrobeedril
harmful/royal_initrobeedril.description: A highly experimental poison originally created by a mad scientist by the name of \SpyGuy\ on earth in 2014.

harmful/cholesterol.name: cholesterol
harmful/cholesterol.description: Pure cholesterol. Probably not very good for you.

harmful/itching.name: itching powder
harmful/itching.description: An abrasive powder beloved by cruel pranksters.

harmful/pacid.name: fluorosulfuric acid
harmful/pacid.description: Fluorosulfuric acid is a an extremely corrosive super-acid.

harmful/tene.name: aqua tenebrae
harmful/tene.description: A highly-caustic fluid comprised of several unknown acids, found in abundance in the seas of X-13.

harmful/pancuronium.name: pancuronium
harmful/pancuronium.description: Pancuronium bromide is a powerful skeletal muscle relaxant.

harmful/polonium.name: polonium
harmful/polonium.description: Polonium is a rare and highly radioactive silvery metal.

harmful/sulfonal.name: sulfonal
harmful/sulfonal.description: An old sedative with toxic side-effects.

harmful/spider_venom.name: venom
harmful/spider_venom.description: An incredibly potent poison. Origin unknown.

harmful/viper_venom.name: viper venom
harmful/viper_venom.description: A dangerous toxin that causes massive bleeding and tissue damage

harmful/neurotoxin.name: neurotoxin
harmful/neurotoxin.description: A dangerous toxin that attacks the nervous system

harmful/neurodepressant.name: neurodepressant
harmful/neurodepressant.description: A debilitating compound that affects muscular function, extracted from neurotoxin.

harmful/mutagen.name: unstable mutagen
harmful/mutagen.description: Might cause unpredictable mutations. Keep away from children.

harmful/omega_mutagen.name: glowing slurry
harmful/omega_mutagen.description: This is probably not good for you.

harmful/formaldehyde/werewolf_serum_fake.name: Werewolf Serum Precursor Alpha
harmful/formaldehyde/werewolf_serum_fake.description: A strange and poisonous lupine compound.

harmful/omega_mutagen/werewolf_serum_fak.name: Werewolf Serum Precursor Beta
harmful/omega_mutagen/werewolf_serum_fak.description: A potent and very unstable mutagenic substance.

harmful/fake_initropidril.name: initropidril
harmful/fake_initropidril.description: A highly potent toxin - can kill within minutes.

harmful/wolfsbane.name: Aconitine
harmful/wolfsbane.description: Also known as monkshood or wolfsbane, aconitine is a very potent neurotoxin.

harmful/toxic_slurry.name: toxic slurry
harmful/toxic_slurry.description: A filthy, carcinogenic sludge produced by the Slurrypod plant.

harmful/histamine.name: histamine
harmful/histamine.description: Immune-system neurotransmitter. If detected in blood, the subject is likely undergoing an allergic reaction.

harmful/sarin.name: sarin
harmful/sarin.description: A lethal organophosphate nerve agent. Can be neutralized with atropine.

harmful/dna_mutagen.name: stable mutagen
harmful/dna_mutagen.description: Just the regular, boring sort of mutagenic compound.  Works in a completely predictable manner.

harmful/madness_toxin.name: Rajaijah
harmful/madness_toxin.description: A synthetic version of a potent neurotoxin derived from plants capable of driving a person to madness. First discovered in India by a Belgian reporter in 1931.

harmful/strychnine.name: strychnine
harmful/strychnine.description: A highly potent neurotoxin in crystalline form. Causes severe convulsions and eventually death by asphyxiation. Has been known to be used as a performance enhancer by certain athletes.
